Audiobook.Title: Flow
Audiobook.Subtitle: Living at the Peak of Your Abilities
Audiobook.Author: Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi Ph.D.
Audiobook.Summary: In flow, everyday experience becomes a moment by moment opportunity for joy and self-fulfillment. Flow is the brain-child of a fascinating psychologist, Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi, a renowned social scientist who has devoted his life's work to the study of what makes people truly happy, satisfied and fulfilled.
